00110     enum {
00111         // * This widget is visible.  Use with {@link #setVisibility}.
00112         VISIBLE = 0x00000000,
00113 
00114         // * This widget is invisible, but it still takes up space
00115         // * for layout purposes.
00116         // * Use with {@link #setVisibility}.
00117         INVISIBLE = 0x00000004,
00118 
00119         // * This widget is invisible, and it doesn't take any space for layout
00120         // * purposes. Use with {@link #setVisibility}.
00121         GONE = 0x00000008
00122     };

01895 class WidgetTag {
01896     static const int32_t NO_ID = -1;
01897 
01898   private:
01899     int32_t mId;
01900     int32_t mItemType;
01901     int32_t mContainer;
01902     int32_t mScreen;
01903     int32_t mCellX;
01904     int32_t mCellY;
01905     int32_t mSpanX;
01906     int32_t mSpanY;
01907     bool mIsGesture;
01908 
01909   public:
01910     WidgetTag();
01911     virtual ~WidgetTag();
01912     explicit WidgetTag(WidgetTag* tag);
01913     void setId(int32_t id);
01914     void setItemType(int32_t itemType);
01915     void setContainer(int32_t container);
01916     void setscreen(int32_t screen);
01917     void setCellX(int32_t cellX);
01918     void setCellY(int32_t cellY);
01919     void setSpanX(int32_t spanX);
01920     void setSpanY(int32_t spanY);
01921     void setGesture(bool isGesture);
01922 
01923     int32_t getId();
01924     int32_t getItemType();
01925     int32_t getContainer();
01926     int32_t getScreen();
01927     int32_t getCellX();
01928     int32_t getCellY();
01929     int32_t getSpanX();
01930     int32_t getSpanY();
01931     bool getIsGesture();
01932 };
01933 }
